casebody.data:
MOSTELLER MANSION
v.
MACTEC ENGINEERING. No. 297P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. E. Thomison Holman, George Ward Hendon, Asheville, for Mosteller Mansion. Calvin T. Vick, Jr., Greenville, SC, Matthew W. Kitchens, for Mactec Engineering.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of July 2008 by Calvin T. Vick, Jr. to appear Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of August 2008."
